examples: I fail to see the logic behind his argument.
No veo la lógica detrás de su argumento.
The two parts of the plan were governed by the same logic.
Las dos partes del plan se rigen por la misma lógica.
Linking the proposals in a single package did have a certain logic.
Vincular las propuestas en un solo paquete tenía cierta lógica.
a strategy based on sound commercial logic
una estrategia basada en una sólida lógica comercial
